nodes.text: PowerStation Studios, also credited as PowerStation, is a design studio that is based in the United Kingdom and works primarily with clients in the United States. PowerStation Studios has provided graphic design for Star Wars homeware merchandise, as well as illustrations for the young-reader books Star Wars: Who's Who in the Galaxy: Character Storybook, Star Wars: 10-Button Sounds: Droids, and Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Resistance.
